name: Escape from Dumb Ling
description:
We are pleased to present our creation to you! Enjoy the process, be healthy and never be sad! Play this game in full screen

All assets (art / code / sounds / music / effects) were created during the JUICE jam

*There is no input delay in code for jumps! Might be browser issue for someone, we really sorry if you encounter it

A few tricks: 

1. Do not forget that the jump can be double, and sometimes even higher 

2. Every time Ling gets 5 bullets, he slows down, so in order to win, don't forget to shoot as hard as you can

3. Don't try to jump over Cockroaches. They are too fast. Just Shoot them!
